summary: Adds several Kulve Taroth from Monster Hunter to the world.
author: The name of the modder
LT_version: Version of LT it was last tested on, or built from in the case of a custom build
description:
New race mod:
Kulve Taroth (from Monster Hunter)

special moves :
- gold shed
- heated air

TF item : gold plated steak

body parts :
all excepts tentacles, wings and antennas.
dependencies: A list of the names of each mod required for this one
tags: OPTIONAL:A list of words that can be used to find the mod when filtering on them
